sect2.title: HTTPSSender
sect2.para:
HTTPSSender is similar to the HTTPSender (see
) and so it shares the same properties. The difference is that the HTTPSSender uses HTTPS instead of plain HTTP protocol to send the messages.

The HTTPSSender's properties are described in the following table:
HTTPSSender properties
Property name Description Required Default value
keyStore Path to the key store No -
keyStorePassword Key store password No -
trustStore Path to the trust store No -
trustStorePassword Trust store password No -

simplesect.title: Example of HTTPSSender configuration
simplesect.programlisting: ... <sender class="HTTPSSender"> <property name="target" value="http://domain.com/the/most-cool/secured_url"/> <property name="method" value="POST"/> <property name="trustStore" value="${my.keystores}/cacert.jks"/> <property name="trustStorePassword" value="ts_passsword"/> ... </sender> ...
